mapper.insert: insert into course_table (course_no, course_name, course_properties, course_score, course_hour) values (#{courseNo},#{courseName},#{courseProperties},#{courseScore},#{courseHour})
mapper.select: select course_no as courseNo, course_name as courseName, course_properties as courseProperties, course_score as courseScore, course_hour as courseHour from course_table where course_no=#{courseNo}
select course_no as courseNo, course_name as courseName, course_properties as courseProperties, course_score as courseScore, course_hour as courseHour from course_table order by course_no
